table.upsert: INSERT INTO test.prospects(P_ID, P_NAME, P_NO, P_SOURCE, P_INSTRUMENTS, P_COMMENT, P_DATEOFINQUIRY, P_ALTERNATENUMBER, P_ADDRESS, P_LOCATION, P_STATUS, P_LASTUPDATED, P_DATEOFREMINDER, P_LASTINTERACTED, P_PREFFEREDLANGUAGE) SELECT * FROM dbmasked.tblprospects where P_LASTUPDATED > '{lupdate}' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE P_NAME = values(P_NAME), P_NO = values(P_NO), P_SOURCE = values(P_SOURCE), P_INSTRUMENTS = values(P_INSTRUMENTS), P_COMMENT = values(P_INSTRUMENTS), P_DATEOFINQUIRY = values(P_DATEOFINQUIRY), P_ALTERNATENUMBER = values(P_ALTERNATENUMBER), P_ADDRESS = values(P_ADDRESS), P_LOCATION = values(P_LOCATION), P_STATUS = values(P_STATUS), P_LASTUPDATED = values(P_LASTUPDATED), P_DATEOFREMINDER = values(P_DATEOFREMINDER), P_LASTINTERACTED = values(P_LASTINTERACTED), P_PREFFEREDLANGUAGE = values(P_PREFFEREDLANGUAGE)
table.delete: DELETE d FROM test.prospects as d LEFT JOIN dbmasked.tblprospects as x ON d.P_ID = x.P_ID WHERE x.P_ID IS NULL

table.upsert: INSERT INTO test.students(S_ID, S_NAME, S_NO, S_INSTRUMENTS, S_COMMENT, S_ADDRESS, S_ALTERNATENUMBER, S_STATUS, S_BATCH, S_FEES_STATUS, S_LASTUPDATED, P_ID, S_ADMISSIONDATE, S_DISCONTINUEDDATE, S_BREAKDATE, S_REMINDERDATE) SELECT * FROM dbmasked.tblstudents where S_LASTUPDATED > '{lupdate}' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE S_NAME = values(S_NAME), S_NO = values(S_NO), S_INSTRUMENTS = values(S_INSTRUMENTS), S_COMMENT = values(S_COMMENT), S_ADDRESS = values(S_ADDRESS), S_ALTERNATENUMBER = values(S_ALTERNATENUMBER), S_STATUS = values(S_STATUS), S_BATCH = values(S_BATCH), S_FEES_STATUS = values(S_FEES_STATUS), S_LASTUPDATED = values(S_LASTUPDATED), P_ID = values(P_ID) , S_ADMISSIONDATE =values(S_ADMISSIONDATE), S_DISCONTINUEDDATE = values(S_DISCONTINUEDDATE), S_BREAKDATE = values(S_BREAKDATE), S_REMINDERDATE = values(S_REMINDERDATE)
table.delete: DELETE d FROM test.students as d LEFT JOIN dbmasked.tblstudents as x ON d.S_ID = x.S_ID WHERE x.S_ID IS NULL
